#Text=Fußball-Bundesliga 2007 – 08 : Stuttgart vs. Bayern Munich
#Text=Saturday , November 10 , 2007
#Text=November 10 , 200715:30 ( UTC+1 )
#Text=Stuttgart 3 – 1 Bayern Munich
#Text=Gottlieb Daimler Stadion , Stuttgart
#Text=Attendance : 55,600
#Text=Referee : Thorsten Kinhöfer
#Text=Gomez 10'(6)Cacau 24'Hilbert 30'(1)Gomez 42'(7)Bastürk 46'Khedira 46'Pardo 69'Cacau 74'Marica 74'Gomez 80'Beck 80'Tasci 90'Schäfer 90+1 '
#Text=Match Report 45 ' Podolski 46 ' Podolski 46 ' Lell 46 ' Klose 46 ' Schweinsteiger 52 ' Schweinsteiger70 ' Lucio 72 ' Kroos 72 ' Van Buyten 86'(9 ) Toni 88 ' Ribery
#Text=Bayern Munich suffered it 's 1st defeat of the Bundesliga season after losing 3-1 to reigning champions Stuttgart .
#Text=This was Bayern Munich 's 1st lost in 7 months .
#Text=Mario Gomez gave Stuttgart the lead after only 10 minutes and Yildiray Bastürk gave Stuttgart a 2 goal lead after an half hour .
#Text=Thorsten Kinhöfer was in the spotlight after denying Bayern Munich a goal which looked to cross the line .
#Text=Stuttgart added a 3rd just before half time .
#Text=Bayern Munich got a goal back with 4 minutes left .
#Text=Other 2nd half highlights included a red card for Lucio .
#Text=He was sent off for retaliating against a Stuttgart player .
#Text=Toni Kroos started his 1st professional game while Lukas Podolski got another start while Miroslav Klose started on the bench .
#Text=Bayern Munich and Stuttgart are off for 2 weeks due to a set of internationals a week today and a week from next Wednesday .
#Text=Post-match quotes
#Text=It ’s not been a good week for us .
#Text=Unfortunately , we failed to win in the UEFA Cup on Thursday , and today we ’ve deservedly lost for the first time this season .
#Text=Our problems started two or three weeks ago .
#Text=The task now is to regroup and start a new run .
#Text=— Karl-Heinz Rummenigge , FCBAYERN . de
#Text=It was an off day .
#Text=We spent the afternoon asking ourselves : how can we make it easier for our opponents ?
#Text=Our display in the first half had nothing to do with football .
#Text=We ran away from our tackles , and obviously that ’s not on .
#Text=A chain of errors led to their third , and it was over once Lucio was sent off .
#Text=VfB took a professional approach to the game which Bayern lacked .
#Text=— Franz Beckenbauer , FCBAYERN . de
#Text=We slept through the first quarter of an hour .
#Text=We did n’t show enough aggression , we tried to play our way to success .
#Text=We always knew it would be extremely tough in Stuttgart , so I fail to understand why we were n’t up for it physically .
#Text=We were badly organised at the back and non-existent up front .
#Text=We gave our opponents all the encouragement they needed .
#Text=We woke up after their second , we had a promising spell and we were close to pulling one back .
#Text=If we ’d scored , I think we ’d have gone on and taken something from the game , but it was unbelievably difficult at 3-0 down . — Ottmar Hitzfeld , FCBAYERN . de
#Text=We were lethargic in the first half , we did n’t go looking for the ball , and we did n’t win the ball .
#Text=We never came near the attitude we needed for this match , so there was no way we were going to come away with anything .
#Text=We ’ve now got 14 days to get over it , and then we ’ll be back with a vengeance .
#Text=We ’ll sit down and analyse the situation , but we ’re not going to panic .
#Text=We ’re still top of the table .
#Text=You ’re obviously going to suffer minor setbacks at some point during a season .
#Text=We ’ve got our defeat over and done with , and we ’ll learn the lessons from it .
#Text=If we now go on and win the league , no-one will ever mention this game again .
#Text=— Oliver Kahn , FCBAYERN . de
#Text=My team played well , especially in the first half .
#Text=We were aggressive from the start and denied them space , otherwise you do n’t stand a chance against Bayern .
#Text=It worked to perfection in the first half . — Armin Veh , FCBAYERN . de
